boardgame.name: Runewars
Runewars: Kampf um Terrinoth
符文戰爭
boardgame.description: Runewars is an epic board game of conquest, adventure, and fantasy empires for two to four players. Runewars pits players against each other in a strategic game of battles and area control, where they must gather resources, raise armies, and lay siege to heavily fortified cities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Runewars takes place in the same popular fantasy universe as the board games Runebound, Descent: Journeys in the Dark and Rune Age, and dozens of fan-favorite heroes and monsters play their part. The wars for the dragon runes are beginning, and only one faction will emerge victorious._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. RUNEWARS: $77.68 Fantasy Flight Games Availability:PRE-ORDER - Game not yet released SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country. We charge actual shipping cost and there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! Multiple games can be combined in a single shipment to save you money. Shipping methods: US Orders: USPS from zipcode 98230. Canadian Orders: Canada Post from postal code V3S 1C7. International Orders: USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Interac Money Transfer (Canadian bank account holders only) 3) Credit Card - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (processed by PayPal) 4) COD for local pickups in greater Vancouver (BC) area. A pre-paid deposit is required for local pick-ups. Deposit is credited to your bill when you pick up your games. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG RW01) Runewars is an epic board game of conquest, adventure, and fantasy empires for two to four players. Designed by Corey Konieczka, Runewars pits players against each other in a strategic game of battles and area control, where they must gather resources, raise armies, and lay siege to heavily fortified cities. Runewars takes place in the same popular fantasy universe as the best-selling board games Runebound and Descent: Journeys in the Dark, and dozens of fan-favorite heroes and monsters play their part. The wars for the dragon runes are beginning, and only one faction will emerge victorious. What would you do to claim the ultimate power? Runewars includes: -A thorough 40-page instruction guide -Nearly two hundred highly-detailed plastic miniatures -Over two hundred tokens -Over two hundred cards, both small and standard sized -13 map tiles, each composed of multiple hexes and including stunning three-dimensional mountain terrain!
Opened but UNPUNCHED, UNPLAYED. All internal packages still sealed. Box in NEW/NM condition. Shipping is $10 US, $30 international. Payment via Amazon Gift Card (instant) or check (mail).
Domestic Shipping: UPS GROUND with INSURANCE = $14.99
Domestic Shipping: UPS GROUND with INSURANCE = $14.99

All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country. We charge actual shipping cost and there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! Multiple games can be combined in a single shipment to save you money. Shipping methods: US Orders: USPS from zipcode 98230. Canadian Orders: Canada Post from postal code V3S 1C7. International Orders: USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Interac Money Transfer (Canadian bank account holders only) 3) Credit Card - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (processed by PayPal) 4) COD for local pickups in greater Vancouver (BC) area. A pre-paid deposit is required for local pick-ups. Deposit is credited to your bill when you pick up your games. 5) Money Order - We will accept postal money orders but will not ship until we have received and cashed the money order. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. This is for Daniel Kenel (Hawkeye77) only. Won in the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;25 games - 1 Week_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; auction I bought the game used (there is some wide, clear tape across the bottom and sides). This was not from a thrift. The box has some shelf wear, but is still solid. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s been opened and mostly punched, but it was never played. I completed the last few punches. The reference sheets, for instance, are still in their original un-opened baggie. The game is fully inventoried and complete. I separated out the faction minis (they were all in one big bag). Some of the minis can use a heated re-adjustment but they are all there and intact. The parts are in very good to excellent condition. I hesitate to say everything is like new as there are a few nits here and there, but mostly the game is in great shape. Additional Elements I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m guessing there was one extra sheet of chits as there are some extra bits. However, there are also 4 extra minis. - 4 extra Hell Hound minis - An extra Latari Elves playing board - 7 extra city tiles (this is twice the number) I will ship via USPS after payment is received (and shipping costs determined) unless you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like it shipped some other way, and will combine shipping with multiple items. From US zip code: 97520. This is a big, and relatively weighty box, so shipping will be higher than usual.

Fantasy Flight Games (FFGRW03) Runewars is an epic board game of conquest, adventure, and fantasy empires for two to four players. Designed by Corey Konieczka, Runewars pits players against each other in a strategic game of battles and area control, where they must gather resources, raise armies, and lay siege to heavily fortified cities. Runewars takes place in the same popular fantasy universe as the best-selling board games Runebound and Descent: Journeys in the Dark Second Edition, and dozens of fan-favorite heroes and monsters play their part. The wars for the dragon runes are beginning, and only one faction will emerge victorious. What would you do to claim the ultimate power?
